Another reason is that

and dirt onto the skin

- When you pop a pimple what you're doing
is damaging the skin tissue around it.

Now you may not immediately
see harmful effects
but what you're doing is, over time,
if you continue to damage that skin tissue

you're deteriorating the
proteins that repair the skin,
ultimately disrupting the healing process.

So, it may take a few

up with a permanent scar.
